content: {A虎啸}Just between you and me, I feel there's something "good" inside some sculptures...

content: {A歪头}Do you want me to jump up to the roof of the Omni-Gallery and let out a roar? Whenever a new building pops up on Gem Street, they always have me roar from the rooftop.
